name: Halo x Horn
description:
Can you find a happy ending even when the world is against you?

You unwittingly travel into the world of Mary Shelley's novel Frankenstein; or, The Modern Prometheus and become its main characters! For better or worse, you have to make your own decisions to influence the plot and avoid the character's original ending—death. 

Halo x Horn explores themes of lookism, classism, and the fine line between humanity and monstrosity. With its story, we hope to show that monsters are not necessarily evil by nature, but rather created by people through their prejudice.

Note: Knowledge of the novel is not required to play the game.
